```{r stab1, include=TRUE, echo=TRUE}
library(car)
setwd("c:/data/csv")
koleva <-read.csv("koleva.csv", header=TRUE)
bbatch <-as.character(batch)
#head(koleva)
model <-lm(assay...~month*batch+batch+month, data=koleva)
summary(model)
anova(model)
Anova(model, type="III")
```
